about_the_game:
Is it hard to be a penguin? - Of course it is. And it's even harder to be a scientist penguin who has his beloved stolen from him. Every story has heroes and villains, but in this game the villain has gone over the top. Evil scientist named Travis with his minions attacked the most peaceful town and made a real mayhem there, in addition, he also stole the beloved of our protagonist - a royal penguin named Niels. And you my friend will have to go together with Nils through the hard tests in order to take Lisa out of the clutches of harmful villain.

On the way you are waiting for a variety of locations such as city sewers, swampy swamps, abandoned mines and many others, but I'm sure my dear friend that you will get through all the hardships and will be able to overcome the nasty scientist Travis.

The game has 8 different levels filled with a variety of traps and difficulties, almost every level you are waiting for an interesting boss to which you need your own individual approach.

Go on an adventure with the cute penguin Niels.
